name: Shadar Logoth
description:
SHAH-dahr LOH-goth

In the Old Tongue, "the Place Where the Shadow Waits." A city abandoned and shunned since the Trolloc Wars. Also called "Shadow's Waiting"

name: Baerlon
description:
BAYR-lon

A city in Andor on the road from Caemlyn to the mines in the Mointains of Mist.
